title: Web-Based Mathematics Education Course Design for Diverse Learners

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Learners access web-based tools using personal devices (tablets/laptops), improving mathematical problem-solving skills through project-based learning. Requires tiered content design considering diverse learning abilities and backgrounds

learning_goals: Learners can hierarchically explain math concepts in three stages (basic-intermediate-advanced) using web-based tools
Learners can collaboratively model and solve real-world industrial problems mathematically with peers in a PBL environment
Learners can utilize accessibility support features (captions, text-to-speech, visual aids) embedded in digital learning materials according to context
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
